DOC.HEADLINE: THE PRESS ; CARTOONISTS DRAW LESSONS FROM RABIN AND ARAFAT
DOC.TEXT: Bargaining to the last moment , Israel and the Palestine Liberation Organization finally put pen to paper last Wednesday , signing the agreement to bring self-rule to Jericho and the Gaza Strip.It was the first_step in what Palestinians hope will become a wider homeland , perhaps a state . The long road to the peace agreement and practical self-rule ended in Cairo , where the signing ceremony took_place . PLO Chairman Yasser Arafat and Prime_Minister Yitzhak Rabin represented the two parties . But deployment of PLO officials was off to a slow start by Monday .
